title: History and Tales of the Crusades - Collection 5
description:
History and Tales of the Crusades - Collection 5:

We have here 24 titles:

-  Armstrong - Holy War; the Crusades and Their Impact on Today's World (2001)

-  Asbridge - The First Crusade; a New History (2005)

-  Beha-Eddin - The Life of Saladin (1897)

-  Bysted - The Crusade Indulgence; Spiritual Rewards and the Theology of the Crusades, c. 1095-1216 (2014)

-  Catlos - Infidel Kings and Unholy Warriors; Faith, Power, and Violence in the Age of Crusade and Jihad (2014)

-  Christie - Muslims and Crusaders; Christianity's Wars in the Middle East, 1095-1382, from the Islamic Sources (2014)

-  Cobb - The  Race for Paradise; an Islamic History of the Crusades (2014)

-  Dass - The Deeds of the Franks and Other Jerusalem-Bound Pilgrims; the Earliest Chronicle of the First Crusade (2011)

-  Figes - Crimea; the Last Crusade (2010)

-  Harris - Byzantium and the Crusades, 2e (2014)

-  Jones - The Crusades Biographies (2005)

-  Jones - The Crusades Primary Sources (2005)

-  Jotischky - Crusading and the Crusader States (2004)

-  Kostick (Ed.) - The Crusades and the Near East (2011)

-  Maier - Crusade Propaganda and Ideology; Model Sermons for the Preaching of the Cross (2000)

-  Murray (Ed.) - From Clermont to Jerusalem; the Crusades and Crusader Societies, 1095-1500 (1998)

-  Murray (Ed.) - The Crusades; an Encyclopedia, 4 volumes (2006)

-  Nicolle - Hattin 1187; Saladin's Greatest Victory (1993)

-  O'Callaghan - The Gibraltar Crusade; Castile and the Battle for the Strait (2011)

-  Phillips - Holy Warriors; a Modern History of the Crusades (2009)

-  Pickles - Malta 1565; Last Battle of the Crusades (1998)

-  Riley-Smith - The Crusades, Christianity, and Islam (2008)

-  Slack - Historical Dictionary of the Crusades (2003)

-  Ulwan & Abu Zeid - Salah Ad-Din Al-Ayyubi; Hero of the Battle of Hattin and Liberator of Jerusalem.., 2e (2004)
